name: Umbrella Tree (Completed)
description:
Plot

In a world where everyone over 17 has access to a private dream dimension, four teens realize their dreams may not be totally their own.

Complete gameplay, featuring:
  • 12,700+ word storyline
  • Mini-games during the interval chapter
  • Original music with 6 tracks
  • Two endings up to your interpretation
Credits ART
  • Writing - Otometaku
  • Character Sprites, Graphics UI, and Writing - Otometaku
    Main Backgrounds (Umbrella Tree) - FishyFeathers
  • Misc Background Credits: Kimagure After, processed photos from Unsplash (Francisco Suarez, im3rd media, Atrin Mazinai, Christopher Jolly)
MUSIC
  • Main Umbrella Tree OST Album - Theguyhere
    • Listen to the Album on Youtube
  • Menu Song - Amarantheum
SPECIAL THANKS TO:
  • Theguyhere, for the epic style music. I was originally expecting 2-3 songs at max, but then he was like, "Boom, 6 songs." TT v TT
  • NerdyandExhausted (previously known as "Sarcastic Editor" in Life On), for the pre-plays and helpful suggestions.
  • Everyone who listened to my original ideas and encouraged the game's development: KV, cakekio, SS, AW, and donutdestroyer.
Downloadable Version Coming Soon!
